Dear Sir/Mam

  It is to inform you that Science & Technology Department, Haryana has
introduced a scholarship scheme ‘Promotion of Science Education (POSE)’ for
the students pursuing courses in basic & natural science subjects as
specified in the scheme. Copy of advertisement released in the newspapers
is attached herewith. The detailed guidelines of the scheme along-with the
procedure for submission of online application is available on our office
website i.e. http://dstharyana.gov.in/html/whatsnew.htm for your reference.
The last date for submitting online applications is *28.10.2022 (5:00
pm)* through
web portal *saralharyana.gov.in <http://saralharyana.gov.in/>.*
It is therefore, requested to upload the scheme on your institute website,
put the same on the notice board, and circulate it to the concerned
departments of your institute, so that eligible students may submit their
application well in time.
-- 


*Scientific Engineer (B) Science & Technology Department, HaryanaBays
35-38, Sector-2, Panchkula*

*E-mail: - pose.scholarship@gmail.com <pose.scholarship@gmail.com>*

*Fax No. 0172-2560018*
*Phone No. 0172-2560309, 2560339*


*****************************************************

Dear Students,

*Kind attention of the students who registered for B.Tech Semester 2
courses in Jan-May 2022.*

The results of semester 2 courses are out now. Kindly fill the attached
google form <https://forms.gle/dPXWyZ1gRJmDAdxx5> to register for the
supplementary exams of Semester 2 courses. We will check your eligibility
for writing supplementary exams and will send the Schedule of Test in
coming days. Please note the test will be conducted in Offline mode.You are
requested to fill the google form latest by 10 am on *3rd July, 2022.*

*Please note the registration of all other supplementary exams are
completed already. You can fill the google form only if you have U grade
for Semester 2 courses in Jan-May 2022 semester.*


-- 
*With Thanks and Regards*
*Academics Section*
*IIT Palakkad*

Dear Students,

    The transition from school to college life is hard at times.  Some
people easily adapt to that and some people feel it's really very
difficult. In between the journey also you can experience a lot of
difficulties.

     Team Mitra would like to explore more about the issues of BTech
students. We expect maximum participation from the students. Completing the
survey will definitely make a change in your life and the students who
will join our institute in the future.

      Kindly spare 5 to 10 minutes and be a part of the change process.
Link:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdWmUuycgXLOAF5RAs3S1qt1mN2uPqXnvBw2L2wUDBYkuDPGw/viewform?usp=sf_link

*****************************************************

*DAY 215*
*                                     15/05/2022*

*DRIFTWOOD IN A STREAM*

 Practice at least five minutes of mindfulness meditation today, being
aware of the different thoughts as they arise in the mind.
  ♦ Breathe mindfully, allowing the body to be very relaxed and still.
♦ Observe the thoughts as they pass through your mind, and allow them to
drift past you, like driftwood floating in a stream.
♦ Whenever a thought arises in the mind, silently say, “And there goes
another one . . . ,” bringing the awareness back to the breath.

*****************************************************

*Choose the right answer from the options provided to form meaningful
sentences*

1. _____ they coming over for dinner?

 Is
 Are
 Am

2. Maya _____ not sleeping on our sofa one more time.

 is
 are
 am

3. My mother-in-law is _____ at our house this week.

 stay
 staying
 be staying

4. I _____ my dinner right now.

 eat
 eating
 am eating

5. My sister _____ Spanish.

 learn
 is learning
 learning

6. I _____ at the hair salon until September.

 work
 be working
 am working

7. We _____ at a fancy restaurant tonight. Jason decided this yesterday.

 eat
 are eating
 eats

8. Why ________ playing football tomorrow?

 he not is
 he isn't
 isn't he

9. They are _____ a new shopping mall downtown.

 opening
 openning
 oppening

10. Mahima is _____ down on her bed.

 lieing
 liying
 lying

*Answers*

1. Are
2. is
3. staying
4. am eating
5. is learning
6. am working
7. are eating
8. isn't he
9. opening
10. lying

regards, Sandhya
-- 
English Language Support & Services
IIT Palakkad
https://iitpkd.ac.in/elss

DAY 282
23/07/2022

*DNA ACTIVATION VISUALIZATION MEDITATION *

We carry all the genetic information necessary for a perfectly healthy and
strong body. In this meditation we will merge mind and matter in an
exercise to activate our highest potential through allowing it to emerge.
  ♦ Set a timer for at least five minutes, begin to meditate, and allow the
body to relax deeply.
  ♦ Visualize your double helix DNA and envision it as it moves throughout
every part of your body.
  ♦ Gradually releasing all the tension in your body, imagine your DNA
radiating bright light.
  ♦ Imagine that this bright light is activating the highest possible
expression of your genetic potential.
  ♦ Visualize your body getting stronger and healthier, your mind getting
clearer and sharper, and your immune system becoming almost invincible.

*****************************************************

Dear All,

Ms. Sagila Gangadharan, PhD Scholar in Department of Electrical Engineering
 will be presenting her research proposal on 21st June 2022 at 02:30 PM
through online mode.

*Title: Direction Decoding of Imagined Hand Movements Using EEG based Brain
Computer Interface*

Date & Time: 21st June 2022 at 02:30 PM
Venue: Zoom meeting details are given below
Meeting ID:  952 7960 2677
Passcode:  924456
Meeting link:
https://zoom.us/j/95279602677?pwd=czBkMnNCS3N0ckZOM2Rxc0ZXZmUvUT09

ABSTRACT :

Direction Decoding of Imagined Hand Movements Using EEG based Brain
Computer Interface

Brain Computer Interface (BCI) that decodes brain signals for communication
and control is a rapidly emerging research area. Motor Imagery BCI
(MI-BCI), which detects and decodes the neural activity associated with the
imagination of movement of different body parts is a potential BCI system
that can be used for neuro-rehabilitation and control of prosthetic
devices. MI-BCIs can be employed to substitute, restore and complement
motor capabilities. Conventional MI-BCIs are based on imagination of
movement of distinct body parts like left vs right hand or left vs right
foot, resulting in limited number of control commands. However, an ideal
MI-BCI should be able to provide accurate, naturalistic and continuous
control of the external effector in order to be suitable for real world
applications. This requires control signals with higher degrees of freedom,
which can be achieved by decoding multiple parameters of the imagined
movement, such as speed, direction, velocity and trajectory. The proposed
work attempts to decode the direction parameters of imagined hand movement
using non-invasive Electroencephalogram (EEG). The research proposal
presentation will cover an overview of MI-BCI systems and proposed
methodologies for direction decoding of imagined hand movement. The
presentation will conclude with a summary of the future work plan.

All are cordially invited.

-- 
Thank you
Regards,

Office of the Dean (Academics)
IIT Palakkad

<https://yourdost.com/assertiveness-test?yd_source=IITPKD_NL&yd_medium=IITPKDMail&yd_campaign=GearUpToGetAheadTest>
Do you often find yourself overloaded with work because you are too polite
to refuse when a fellow collegemate asks for your help?

How often have you been in a situation when you wanted something, but were
afraid to ask because you didn’t want to inconvenience others?

Being unable to speak up fearing long-lasting negative consequences can
lead to stress, burnout, helplessness, and damage relationships.

People shy away from being assertive because they associate it with brash
and aggressive behavior. However, assertiveness is not about being brash,
aggressive, or unpleasant. What does it mean to be assertive? Take the
self-test and find out for yourself.

It’s time to #GearUpToGetAhead

SHOW ME HOW ASSERTIVE I AM
<https://yourdost.com/assertiveness-test?yd_source=IITPKD_NL&yd_medium=IITPKDMail&yd_campaign=GearUpToGetAheadTest>
If you have any further doubts, concerns, queries, or simply want to say
hi, drop us a mail at campus@yourdost.com.


*Standing with You,Team YourDOST*

>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Once you complete the
>>>>>>>>>> https://www.tcs.com/careers/TCSFresherHiringYoP2023 application
>>>>>>>>>> process, you will receive the TCS reference ID.

>>>>>>>>>> registration process ASAP.

>>>>>>>>>> ---------- Forwarded message ---------
>>>>>>>>>> From: Snega V <snega.v1@tcs.com>
>>>>>>>>>> Date: Fri, Jun 24, 2022 at 3:41 PM
>>>>>>>>>> Subject: #Recruitment# ‘TCS NQT’ Campus Hiring, FY’23 -
>>>>>>>>>> Registrations
>>>>>>>>>> To: tpo@iitpkd.ac.in <tpo@iitpkd.ac.in>
>>>>>>>>>> Cc: ANEESH VEETI <aneesh.veeti@tcs.com>, Jesto Raphel <
>>>>>>>>>> jesto.r@tcs.com>, Nimmy Thankachan <nimmy.thankachan@tcs.com>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Dear Sir/Madam,
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Greetings from TCS!
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> We are extremely happy to announce that we are live with
>>>>>>>>>> registrations for the TCS NQT’ Campus Hiring, FY’23 for the batch of 2023.
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Registrations would be open till Friday, July 22, 2022. A
>>>>>>>>>> microsite has been activated in the TCS Career Page. Please click the below
>>>>>>>>>> link for registrations and to get more information on the process.
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> https://www.tcs.com/careers/TCSFresherHiringYoP2023
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Application process:
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Step 1. Logon to the TCS Next Step Portal
>>>>>>>>>> https://nextstep.tcs.com/
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Step 2. Register and apply to the drive
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Scenario A. If you are a registered user, kindly login and
>>>>>>>>>> proceed to complete the application form. Upon submission, kindly click on
>>>>>>>>>> “Apply For Drive”
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Scenario B. If you are a new user, kindly click on Register Now,
>>>>>>>>>> choose category as “IT” and proceed to fill your details. Submit
>>>>>>>>>> your application form and click on “Apply For Drive”
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Step 3. Select your mode of test (In-Centre or Remote) and click
>>>>>>>>>> on Apply
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Step 4. To confirm your status, check "Track Your Application".
>>>>>>>>>> The status should reflect as "Applied for Drive"
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Request your support as always and please encourage maximum
>>>>>>>>>> registrations to leverage this golden opportunity.
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> ** TCS NQT is exclusively open for students graduating in the
>>>>>>>>>> year 2023 with the following academic degrees: Bachelor of Technology
>>>>>>>>>> (B.Tech.) / Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) / Master of Technology (M. Tech)
>>>>>>>>>> / Master of Engineering (M.E.) / Master of Computer Applications (M.C.A.) /
>>>>>>>>>> Master of Science (M.Sc. / M.S.) in any specialization offered by
>>>>>>>>>> recognized universities / colleges.
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Thanks and Regards,
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Snega V
>>>>>>>>>> Talent Acquisition Group- Kerala
>>>>>>>>>> TATA Consultancy Services
>>>>>>>>>> TCS Centre SEZ Unit,
>>>>>>>>>> Infopark PO,
>>>>>>>>>> Kochi - 682042
>>>>>>>>>> India
>>>>>>>>>> Mailto: snega.v1@tcs.com
>>>>>>>>>> Website: http://www.tcs.com
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> =====-----=====-----=====
>>>>>>>>>> Notice: The information contained in this e-mail
>>>>>>>>>> message and/or attachments to it may contain
>>>>>>>>>> confidential or privileged information. If you are
>>>>>>>>>> not the intended recipient, any dissemination, use,
>>>>>>>>>> review, distribution, printing or copying of the
>>>>>>>>>> information contained in this e-mail message
>>>>>>>>>> and/or attachments to it are strictly prohibited. If
>>>>>>>>>> you have received this communication in error,
>>>>>>>>>> please notify us by reply e-mail or telephone and
>>>>>>>>>> immediately and permanently delete the message
>>>>>>>>>> and any attachments. Thank you
>>>>>>>>>>

*****************************************************

Dear All,

As per the information from the TCS team, some of the students registered
haven't filled the '*Apply for drive'* part yet. You can track the
application status for the same and make sure that you have applied for the
drive as per the document attached in the previous mail.


--
*Regards,*
MANOJ K P
Junior Assistant
Career Development Center
IIT Palakkad

>>>>>>>> ** TCS NQT is exclusively open for students graduating in the year
>>>>>>>> 2023 with the following academic degrees: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.)
>>>>>>>> / Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) / Master of Technology (M. Tech) / Master
>>>>>>>> of Engineering (M.E.) / Master of Computer Applications (M.C.A.) / Master
>>>>>>>> of Science (M.Sc. / M.S.) in any specialization offered by recognized
>>>>>>>> universities / colleges.

TCS Drive.

fill the google form <https://forms.gle/t1M5N8YMGr3Ztxdr7> after your
registration process with DT number.

>>>>>>> Dear Sir/Madam,
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Greetings from TCS!
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> We are extremely happy to announce that we are live with
>>>>>>> registrations for the TCS NQT’ Campus Hiring, FY’23 for the batch of 2023.
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Registrations would be open till Friday, July 22, 2022. A microsite
>>>>>>> has been activated in the TCS Career Page. Please click the below link for
>>>>>>> registrations and to get more information on the process.
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> https://www.tcs.com/careers/TCSFresherHiringYoP2023
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Application process:
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Step 1. Logon to the TCS Next Step Portal https://nextstep.tcs.com/
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Step 2. Register and apply to the drive
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Scenario A. If you are a registered user, kindly login and proceed
>>>>>>> to complete the application form. Upon submission, kindly click on “Apply
>>>>>>> For Drive”
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Scenario B. If you are a new user, kindly click on Register Now,
>>>>>>> choose category as “IT” and proceed to fill your details. Submit
>>>>>>> your application form and click on “Apply For Drive”
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Step 3. Select your mode of test (In-Centre or Remote) and click
>>>>>>> on Apply
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Step 4. To confirm your status, check "Track Your Application". The
>>>>>>> status should reflect as "Applied for Drive"
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Request your support as always and please encourage maximum
>>>>>>> registrations to leverage this golden opportunity.
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> ** TCS NQT is exclusively open for students graduating in the year
>>>>>>> 2023 with the following academic degrees: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.)
>>>>>>> / Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) / Master of Technology (M. Tech) / Master
>>>>>>> of Engineering (M.E.) / Master of Computer Applications (M.C.A.) / Master
>>>>>>> of Science (M.Sc. / M.S.) in any specialization offered by recognized
>>>>>>> universities / colleges.
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Thanks and Regards,
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Snega V
>>>>>>> Talent Acquisition Group- Kerala
>>>>>>> TATA Consultancy Services
>>>>>>> TCS Centre SEZ Unit,
>>>>>>> Infopark PO,
>>>>>>> Kochi - 682042
>>>>>>> India
>>>>>>> Mailto: snega.v1@tcs.com
>>>>>>> Website: http://www.tcs.com

Dear All,

Greetings!

This is to inform you that those who haven't registered for the TCS process
can register by 19 July '22.
Please do fill the google form <https://forms.gle/t1M5N8YMGr3Ztxdr7> after
your registration process with DT number.
Last date for registration is 22 July '22.

--
*Regards,*
MANOJ K P
Junior Assistant
Career Development Center
IIT Palakkad

>>>> Dear Sir/Madam,
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> Greetings from TCS!
>>>>
>>>> We are extremely happy to announce that we are live with registrations
>>>> for the TCS NQT’ Campus Hiring, FY’23 for the batch of 2023.
>>>>
>>>> Registrations would be open till Friday, July 22, 2022. A microsite has
>>>> been activated in the TCS Career Page. Please click the below link for
>>>> registrations and to get more information on the process.
>>>>
>>>> https://www.tcs.com/careers/TCSFresherHiringYoP2023
>>>>
>>>> Application process:
>>>>
>>>> Step 1. Logon to the TCS Next Step Portal https://nextstep.tcs.com/
>>>>
>>>> Step 2. Register and apply to the drive
>>>>
>>>> Scenario A. If you are a registered user, kindly login and proceed to
>>>> complete the application form. Upon submission, kindly click on “Apply For
>>>> Drive”
>>>>
>>>> Scenario B. If you are a new user, kindly click on Register Now, choose
>>>> category as “IT” and proceed to fill your details. Submit your application
>>>> form and click on “Apply For Drive”
>>>>
>>>> Step 3. Select your mode of test (In-Centre or Remote) and click
>>>> on Apply
>>>>
>>>> Step 4. To confirm your status, check "Track Your Application". The
>>>> status should reflect as "Applied for Drive"
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> Request your support as always and please encourage maximum
>>>> registrations to leverage this golden opportunity.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> ** TCS NQT is exclusively open for students graduating in the year 2023
>>>> with the following academic degrees: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.) /
>>>> Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) / Master of Technology (M. Tech) / Master of
>>>> Engineering (M.E.) / Master of Computer Applications (M.C.A.) / Master of
>>>> Science (M.Sc. / M.S.) in any specialization offered by recognized
>>>> universities / colleges.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> Thanks and Regards,
>>>>

Dear All,

*Greetings!*

The Deadline for registering 'TCS NQT' is 22 July '22

Please note please *register *and fill out the *'Apply for Drive'* part
without fail in order to attend the assessment.

Since it is an all india recruitment drive please register & apply for the
drive ASAP in order to avoid last minute 'server' related issues.

Update the TCS reference ID in the link below after completing the
registration process.

*https://forms.gle/t1M5N8YMGr3Ztxdr7 <https://forms.gle/t1M5N8YMGr3Ztxdr7>*


--
*Thanks & Regards*
MANOJ K P
Junior Assistant
Career Development Center
IIT Palakkad

> complete the application form. Upon submission, kindly click on “Apply For
> Drive”
>
> Scenario B. If you are a new user, kindly click on Register Now, choose
> category as “IT” and proceed to fill your details. Submit your application
> form and click on “Apply For Drive”
>
> Step 3. Select your mode of test (In-Centre or Remote) and click on Apply

> should reflect as "Applied for Drive"

Greetings from TCS!

We are extremely happy to announce that we are live with registrations for
the TCS NQT’ Campus Hiring, FY’23 for the batch of 2023.

Registrations would be open till Friday, July 22, 2022. A microsite has
been activated in the TCS Career Page. Please click the below link for
registrations and to get more information on the process.

https://www.tcs.com/careers/TCSFresherHiringYoP2023

Application process:

Step 1. Logon to the TCS Next Step Portal https://nextstep.tcs.com/

Step 2. Register and apply to the drive

Scenario A. If you are a registered user, kindly login and proceed to
complete the application form. Upon submission, kindly click on “Apply For
Drive”

Scenario B. If you are a new user, kindly click on Register Now, choose
category as “IT” and proceed to fill your details. Submit your application
form and click on “Apply For Drive”

Step 3. Select your mode of test (In-Centre or Remote) and click on Apply

Step 4. To confirm your status, check "Track Your Application". The status
should reflect as "Applied for Drive"



Request your support as always and please encourage maximum registrations
to leverage this golden opportunity.

Dear All,

                 As you all may be aware, the number of COVID cases in
Kerala are slowly increasing. It is therefore necessary that we strictly
follow the basic COVID protocol put in place as a precautionary measure. *You
are strongly urged to wear masks while moving around in the campus*, use
hand sanitizers regularly and to maintain social distancing wherever
possible. Kindly note that there is absolutely no reason to panic, but it
is important that we treat the matter with seriousness and take necessary
precautions to keep everyone around safe.

(On behalf of the COVID management committee)

country, with the motto “Code the Future”

*****************************************************

Further to my earlier email regarding the same subject , there is a slight
change in the timings of two buses leaving Ahalia in the morning.

Earlier it was mentioned that the buses will start at 7.15 AM.
But considering that the National Flag Hoisting is going to be done at
Permanent Campus , and all have to be transported to Permanent Campus cite,
It has been decided to start the buses at 7.00 AM , instead of 7.15 AM.
Therefore all students from Ahalia are to be ready to get into the buses by
7.00AM.

The Independence day celebrations are expected to be over by 11.00 AM and
the buses will return to Ahalia with students and the two tempos will leave
to Palakkad with Faculty & Staff through the same route and return to
Ahalia after dropping them at their respective points.

Wish you all a very happy Independence
Day we'll in advance.

K.M.UNNI
Advisor,

Greetings from TECHIN!

Please join for the GALA



Arogyam is an online workshop and pitch event organized by MedTech Research
Center of Excellence (MedTech CoE), the joint program by West’s Digital
Technology Center (DTC) in Bengaluru and TECHIN of IIT Palakkad, for
budding entrepreneurs to put forward their ideas to bring medical
technology to life. Arogyam commences on 11 July 2022 and will end on 5
August 2022.


You are invited to join the Gala event of AROGYAM that will be conducted on
08/07/22 ( Friday ) from 6:00 PM. Click on the brochure to join.

About the MedTech CoE

The MedTech Research Center of Excellence (MedTech CoE) was established in
February 2022 at the Technology Innovation Foundation of IIT Palakkad
(TECHIN). This has been set up in collaboration with West Pharmaceutical
Services Inc., (West). Medical Technology devices including primary
containment, drug delivery, injectables (including subcutaneous IV),
wearable devices, therapeutic specific care, hospital-to-home care, etc.
are some of the problems that will be tackled. Hospitals, Medical Research
Centers, and Academia will become partners of this center to complete the
ecosystem.

The primary aim of setting up this MedTech CoE is to identify and promote
upcoming medical research and technology-based start-ups and nurture
emerging ideas into reality with the vision of developing a robust health
technology ecosystem, thereby reaching out to the people in need. This
incubator would enable sharing West’s domain expertise with the emerging
entrepreneurs in the Medical Technology space and thereby serve people
requiring medical needs.

The problem statements will be based on Theme: Utilizing technology and
networking to improve healthcare results and patient experiences and

   -

   Sub themes of the event are



   -

   Assist in the evolvement of accessibility in the healthcare and critical
   care areas
   -

   Leverage connection and IoT to improve patient experiences across
   therapeutic areas,
   -

   Use cases for invasive and non-invasive monitoring and medicine
   administrations in the hospital to home care continuum to ensure
   sustainable strategy
   -

   Data-driven insights and analytics models to aid in better
   decision-making, adherence, and the minimization of adverse events in
   clinical trials and therapies


Details are in the guidelines document – Guideline
<https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NENS8vq21MvfO96Hyl_INGYIPrwLjn6x/view?usp=sharing>



LAST DATE of application 19 July 2022
